General.Name: Tian Jin Global Magnetic Card Co Ltd
General.Description: Tian Jin Bohai Chemical Co.,Ltd. engages in the propane-to-propylene business in China. The company offers financial IC cards, such as social security cards, standard bank IC cards, etc.; non-financial IC cards, including transportation cards; personalized data services for related card products; and city all-in-one card management system and supporting equipment services. Its smart cards, smart terminals, and software and service products are used in social security, finance, public transportation, and other fields. The company was formerly known as Tianjin Global Magnetic Card Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Tian Jin Bohai Chemical Co.,Ltd. in February 2021. Tian Jin Bohai Chemical Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1979 and is based in Tianjin, China.
